detected_errors.description: More than 50% of key rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing or not represented (e.g., kitchen, dining room, bathroom, stair zone/entry layout not matching).

Overall layout/adjacency does not correspond to the 2D plan: the 3D render shows a different internal partitioning and room program (appears like bedrooms/hall), inconsistent with the kitchen-dining-living + stairs + central bathroom arrangement.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway render, it does not faithfully transform the provided 2D floor plan and omits/misrepresents a majority of the plan’s rooms.
